decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the game through the use of Gates and Counterspells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It also utilizes card draw and removal spells such as Brainstorm, Journey to Nowhere, and LÃ³rien Revealed to maintain board control. The deck includes creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact and Squadron Hawk to apply pressure and protect key pieces. The inclusion of Azorius Guildgate and other lands helps to ensure mana consistency. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent through efficient control and resource management.

The deck focuses on using sacrifice effects to trigger powerful abilities, gaining advantage by sacrificing creatures and artifacts to fuel combos and generate card advantage. It utilizes cards like Malevolent Rumble, Sadistic Glee, and Deadly Dispute to sacrifice creatures and generate value. This strategy is further supported by cards like Energy Refractor and Tamiyo's Safekeeping to protect key pieces, while also having interaction with removal and disruption spells like Duress and Eviscerator's Insight. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of sacrifice synergies and resource advantage.

The focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the Sadistic Glee combo, using cards like Basking Broodscale and Eviscerator's Insight to generate value and pressure opponents. By setting up versatile threats like Mesmeric Fiend and Nadier's Nightblade, along with disruption such as Duress, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards its own win condition. With a mix of removal, card draw, and protective spells like Tamiyo's Safekeeping, the deck seeks to control the board and overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and synergies.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on generating value through sacrificing creatures and artifacts while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal spells. It aims to maintain a steady board presence with creatures like Nyxborn Hydra and Krark-Clan Shaman, while also utilizing cards like Blood Fountain and Deadly Dispute to generate card advantage. The deck also includes efficient removal spells like Cast Down and Galvanic Blast to control the battlefield. By combining aggression with resource management, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory in the Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying evasive creatures and disrupting the opponent's game plan with spells like Counterspell and Spell Pierce. By efficiently controlling the board and drawing cards with cards like Ninja of the Deep Hours and Of One Mind, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of threats. The inclusion of Snow-Covered Islands enables synergy with Moon-Circuit Hacker, providing additional versatility and power to the aggressive mono blue strategy.
